name: EGGetBCModules
friendlyName: Get BC modules in a tenant
description: Gets a list of the module objects in Business Central.
helpMarkDown: Please open a GitHub issue at https://github.com/crazycga/bcdevopsextension/issues for queries or support.
author: Evergrowth Consulting

inputs.name: TenantId
inputs.label: Azure Tenant Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure tenant id of the compiling tenant.

inputs.name: EnvironmentName
inputs.label: BC Environment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Business Central environment name of the compiling environment.

inputs.name: ClientId
inputs.label: Azure Client Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure Entra client id for the process.

inputs.name: ClientSecret
inputs.label: Azure Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Azure Entra client secret for the process.

inputs.name: ModuleId
inputs.label: Module Id (a guid)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The module id to search for in the list.

inputs.name: ExcludeMicrosoft
inputs.label: Exclude Microsoft Modules
inputs.helpMarkDown: This excludes Microsoft modules and will only show third-party modules in the list.
